com.cloutree.api
Class ModelEvaluator

java.lang.Object
  com.cloutree.api.ModelEvaluator

public class ModelEvaluator
extends java.lang.Object

ModelEvaluator
Main Class of the ClouTree API. This class can be used to evaluate a model on the ClouTree server and receive the respective results.

Usage:
ModelEvaluator evaluator = new ModelEvaluator("personality-DE");
evaluator.putParameter("EXAMPLE-PARAMETER", "PARAMETER-VALUE");
... put additional parameters...
ModelEvaluationResult result = evaluator.evaluateModel();

Author:
marc Since 10.09.2013

Constructor Detail

ModelEvaluator

public ModelEvaluator(java.lang.String model)
Main constructor. Every evaluator requires a model to be evaluated.

Parameters:
model -

ModelEvaluator

public ModelEvaluator(java.lang.String model,
                      java.lang.Integer revision)
Detailed Constructor. In addition to the main constructor a revision can be set here. If no revision is set in an evaluator the default/active revision of a model will be taken.
Note: The given revision overrides the default/active revision which should be done for test/debug, not for production!

Parameters:
model -
revision -

                         java.lang.String value)
Adds a model-parameter to the evaluator.

Parameters:
key -
value -

evaluateModel

public ModelEvaluationResult evaluateModel()
Evaluates a model on server side and returns the respective ModelEvaluationResult.
Note: This call will result in an HttpRequest sent to the server.

Returns:
result

getModel

public java.lang.String getModel()
Returns the model name to be evaluated.

Returns:
model

getRevision

public java.lang.Integer getRevision()
Returns the set revision for the evaluator
Note: by default a revision should not be set as the server should evaluate the default/active revision

Returns:
revision
